channel.title: Faiasl Alghurayri
channel.description: Portfolio web app for Faisal Alghurayri to share his experience and sample work.

item.title: Why Elixir is a Cool and Practical Langauge
How to Solve Port 5000 Denied on Mac OS Monterey
item.description: I share how to debug local networking issues by showing how to solve being denied from port 5000 after upgrading to Mac OS Monterey.

item.title: How to Build a Calendar (and Scheduling) Based Feature
item.description: I explain the primitives of working with calendar and scheduling features by psuedo building a previous system I've worked on.

item.title: Improve Coverage & Testability by using Test Doubles
item.description: I share some personal anecdotes around testability and coverage in software engineering.

item.title: Sensible JavaScript/TypeScript Apps With Deno
item.description: Some thoughts about Deno and why I think it is the sensible long-term option when developing apps with TypeScript

item.title: Taming Complex UIs with State Machines and Pure Views
item.description: I introduce state machines and their benefits by showing how to manage a complex interactive map UI.

item.title: How to Build Geospatial Apps
item.description: I explain the primitives of working with geospatial apps by building an app using Next JS and MongoDB.

item.title: Reflections on The 2021 StackOverflow Survey
item.description: I share a few reflections on the 2021 StackOverflow developers survey.

item.title: The State of Flow
item.description: I share a story to show the importance of being in a flow state while learning.

item.title: How to Add Internationalization (i18n) Solution
item.description: Discuss what is needed to build a comprehensive internationalization (i18n) solution.

item.title: SSR Streaming is The Future Web Experience
item.description: I explain SSR Streaming and discuss why I think it is the future web experience.

item.title: Should You Care About Coverage
item.description: The difference between test coverage VS code coverage and should you care.

item.title: My Developer Tools (uses)
item.description: I share the tools I use for my daily work as a developer.

item.title: How to Deploy Sveltekit on Heroku
item.description: How to deploy Sveltekit on Heroku using the Node adapter.

item.title: Build Lean Desktop Apps with Tauri
item.description: Tauri vs Electron for building desktop apps.

item.title: Below The Elixir Language Iceberg
item.description: I share what I think is special about Elixir language in the context of building scalable systems.

item.title: Using Elixir, Svelte, and Dart to Build a Location Tracker
